lb:
During an [Airstrike], all Squadrons will launch 10 more planes.
Cheerful upgraded to Level 2.
Bombers will drop their payloads before being engaged by enemy Anti-Air fire.

During Day Battle, increases all damage by 30%.
Cheerful upgraded to Level 3.
Increases aircraft reserves for all categories by 50 aircraft each.

During Day Battle, gains the ability to launch an [Airstrike] immediately that deals 50% damage. This attack will not incur any plane loss.
Cheerful upgraded to Level 4.

skills.name: Class Skill
skills.text:
Airstrikes: Can launch attacks from the map and in battle, has infinite range, reload time when used on map: 60s in battle: 25
Reconnaissance: Planes can be sent when on the map to reveal the fog of war, reload time: 10s

skills.name:
Airgroup Ambush
航空隊奇襲
text: During battle, if [Airstrike] hits, every Bomber Squadron has a 100% chance to reduce target speed by 50% and disables their rudders, lasts 20 seconds. Does not stack

skills.name:
Airgroup Pioneer
航空隊の先駆
text: Increases damage of all Allied Carriers by 5%
When entering Map Mode, all Allied Carriers gain 20 reserve planes on all slots.
